snippet.title: Playstation : Suzu Monogatari (JPN)
snippet.description:
Suzu or Suzumaru Monogatari (鈴ものがたり) is a unique RPG that Capcom released in 2000 exclusively in Japan for the Playstation 1.

The story is pretty simple. Suzumaru lost the 5 of 7 balls of God's and he must now find and return them back. All of them are in the humans's world.

The gameplay part focus on the explore part and the fights based on a smart card-based system.

Infos by Scatman
http://jrpgnews.wordpress.com
